alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 2:02PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Toombs, southeastern Wheeler and central Montgomery Counties through 230 PM EST... At 202 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Jordan, or 9 miles south of Mount Vernon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Uvalda, Ailey, Higgston, Alston, South Thompson, Center, Rock Springs and Charlotteville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
